Gazlowe.name: Rock-It! Turret
Gazlowe.description: Creates a turret that deals 62 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts for 30 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

Gazlowe.name: Deth Lazor
Gazlowe.description: Charged attack that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds. Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

Gazlowe.name: Xplodium Charge
Gazlowe.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

Gazlowe.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
Gazlowe.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

Gazlowe.name: Robo-Goblin
Gazlowe.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

Gazlowe.name: Salvager
Gazlowe.description: Destroyed enemy Structures and your Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes your Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3 seconds.  Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

Gazlowe.name: Focus Turrets!
Gazlowe.description: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.

1.name: Break it Down!
1.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

1.name: Extra TNT
1.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

1.name: Goblin Repairs
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second

1.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
1.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

4.name: ARK Reaktor
4.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

4.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
4.description: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds. Reward: After increasing duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

4.name: Hired Goons
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-It! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
4.description: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

7.name: Engine Gunk
7.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Hyperfocus Coils
7.description: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

7.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
7.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additonal enemies for 60% damage.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

13.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
13.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 50% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

13.name: Goblin Fusion
13.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

13.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
13.description: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

16.name: Kwik Release Charge
16.description: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

16.name: Superior Schematics
16.description: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have 25% increased range while he is within their attack range.

16.name: Turret Storage
16.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

20.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
20.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage.

20.name: It's Raining Scrap
20.description: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage. Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.
